summary: Destiny's Child was an American girl group with final members Beyonc√© Knowles, Kelly Rowland, and Michelle Williams. They started as Girl's Tyme in 1990 in Houston, Texas. After some lineup changes, they found success with hits like "No, No, No" and "Bills, Bills, Bills." Despite internal conflicts, they released more popular songs like "Survivor" and "Independent Women." The group went on hiatus in 2001 and officially disbanded in 2006. They've sold over 60 million records and won two Grammy Awards.
title: Destiny's Child
